title: Jax vs Irelia mid game
body: who wins in the mid game 1v1

replies.body: Depends on how tanky Jax is.  If he's not very tanky then Irelia destroys him.

It goes either way in the mid game, unless someone came out ahead early game. Late game is the same story. The biggest factor in this matchup is that both champs are mechanically intense in the timing and execution of abilities. So, whoever is the better skilled mechanical player will come out on top in this matchup.
there is no way. irelia can beat jax late game. not even a way. jax doesn't even have to E to win duels late game.

> there is no way. irelia can beat jax late game. not even a way

Bronze Jax vs. Master Irelia. I think that counts as a way. 
Bronze Jax vs. Diamond Irelia. Oh, look! Another way.


I'll give you a small applause for trying though. 

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

> i challenge you

to much offensive items

It depends on each build. If Irelia has Trinity>full tank and last item or 4/5 botrk she will beat Jax no matter if he has tanky build and damage.

Also it depends on who snowballed first. But be awared that Irelia with 1/7 can still beat Jax at certain level.

Jax wins duels after level 11. early game its irelia but still 50/50. late game however not much of a chance to irelia. he does more damage than her to tanky bruisers because his damage is mixed. and his E will have very low cd as he will get 40% cd
If they have the same items i'd probably give it to jax since he can dodge some of the true damage autos and ramps up his strength the longer he lasts in the fight.
